Action.Name: DlgCheckBox.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of a check box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the check box control whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgCheckBox.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a check box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the check box control whose properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the check box control properties indexed by "Checked", "Enabled", "Text" and "Visible."
